properties.areaDesc: Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal westward out to 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 2:16PM PST until January 23 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Hazardous sea conditions.

* WHERE...Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal westward out to 10
NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM PST THURSDAY
